reasoning: Reporting incidence of new diagnoses in pediatric population. ERA represents approximately 15-20% of JIA cases, with overall JIA incidence of 4-5 per 100k children. Estimated at ~0.8 per 100k children globally. Moderate confidence due to limited population-based epidemiological studies.
source: Saurenmann RK et al. (2007). Epidemiology of juvenile idiopathic arthritis in a multiethnic cohort. Arthritis Rheum. 56(6):1974-1984
